alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 22 at 4:30PM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with snow covered roads and very poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4406 7558 4423 7555 4426 7581 4419 7616 4411 7627 4398 7605 4387 7628 4367 7620 4374 7584 4388 7573 TIME Y22M01D23T0000Z-Y22M01D23T1200Z COORD...4387 7583 4397 7590 4395 7612 4388 7613 4389 7625 4367 7620 4367 7602 4371 7598 4370 7580 4377 7584 TIME Y22M01D23T1200Z-Y22M01D23T1800Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
